lead_paragraph: COLBY--Dr. Marvelle S. The entire Marymount Manhattan College community mourns the loss of one of our most dedicated faculty members, Professor Emerita, Dr. Marvelle S. Colby. A leader in the business and entrepreneurial fields, Dr. Colby served Marymount Manhattan College for 21 years as a member of the Business Management and Accounting Division, during which time she also served as the Division Chair. In 2007, a number of Dr. Marvelle S. Colby's former students, colleagues, faculty, and staff joined together to create the Dr. Marvelle S. Colby Endowed Scholarship Fund to ensure that her legacy will live on at the College for years to come. Dr. Colby was a valued member of the Marymount Manhattan College community and we mourn this loss and share our condolences with her family. Funeral services will be held at Riverside Memorial Chapel, 180 West 76th Street, New York, NY, Friday, January 22nd at 11:15am. The services will be followed by burial at Woodlawn Cemetery. Kerry Walk, Ph.D., President, Marymount Manhattan College; Hope Knight, Chairperson of the Board of Trustees, Marymount Manhattan College 1/3
